alert.note: Alert for Clay; Owen; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:27PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Vigo, southwestern Clay and west central Owen Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Terre Haute, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Vigo, southwestern Clay and west central Owen Counties, including the following locations... Center Point, Clay City, Cory, Saline City and Riley. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 11 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for west central Indiana.
